oh, i dont even bother with nautius places as it hasn't worked for me ever, dating back to breezy. to see your network, go to nautilus and enter this: smb://ipaddressofmachinehere    and then hit enter, it should pop up a prompt for a username and password. if you want to just see the shares that your box is sharing, enter  testparm
